short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays information about the TWIST cryptocurrency using the cryptopia exchange and TWIST APIs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays information about the TWIST (twist.network) crypto currency using cryptopia and TWIST APIs. Also includes a TWIST ID address lookup feature.
